item.title: Hi
item.description: This place is perpetually in-development! Me Well, I’m told I am INTJ-T. Socials You can find a list of my socials at the top right of the page! Referral Links Digital Ocean is my hosting provider, known as the “developer cloud” because of how easy it is to go from a new account to running servers. I feel comfortable with their services rather than a big cloud provider such as AWS, Azure or GCP – Their clouds can feel like a house of very expensive cards and I don’t need that for my projects.
